label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the creator of the social post when someone likes the original social post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Head description of the social post
##CreatedDate## - Date when the like was added
##FullName## - Name of the user who liked the social

template.subject: Social - like added
template.body: ##FullName## has added a like to your post: ##ActivityTitle##
